about_the_game:
Character Skins
Tired of the same old box face?
Then it's time for a makeover.
This DLC contains the following 6 Box Maze 2 player skins used to change the appearance of your character in game.

1. Family Dog
2. Family Cat
3. The Emotional Kid
4. The Soccer Mom
5. The Jock
6. The Peace Maker
detailed_description:
Character Skins
Tired of the same old box face?
Then it's time for a makeover.
This DLC contains the following 6 Box Maze 2 player skins used to change the appearance of your character in game.

1. Family Dog

3. The Emotional Kid

name: Box Maze 2 - Family Skins Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Box Maze 2 - Family Skins Pack - $0.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Box Maze 2 - Family Skins Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 1.8Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 9500 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Box Maze 2 hardly uses any computing power and is very likely to run smooth on most computers. If your pc has lower specs than this and runs the game without issues please let us know so we can look into it and update this information.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above.
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 9800 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card

short_description: DLC Skin Pack for Box Maze 2 Includes 6 Skins for Cubert.
